This is what happens because you guys surrender so easily."},{"lineNumber":40833,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんなことになるんだろうが。","translatedEnglishLine":"This kind of thing would demons...\""},{"lineNumber":40838,"originalJapaneseLine":"「けっ、根性無しが」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, you’re a coward.\""},{"lineNumber":40839,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス……無理言っちゃだめだよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance... don’t be too harsh.\""},{"lineNumber":40840,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔軍が通り過ぎたと言っても、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even if the demon army has passed through,"},{"lineNumber":40841,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物の襲撃がまったくないわけではありません。","translatedEnglishLine":"it doesn't mean there won't be any monster attacks at all."},{"lineNumber":40842,"originalJapaneseLine":"　逃げ遅れた市民を守るためには、これしか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"To protect the citizens who couldn't escape, this is the only way...\""},{"lineNumber":40843,"originalJapaneseLine":"「結局俺が何とかしてやるしかないのか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In the end, does that mean I have to do something about this myself?"},{"lineNumber":40844,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ガルティアはどこだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Where’s Galtia?\""},{"lineNumber":40845,"originalJapaneseLine":"「最前線はもう少し北……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The front line is a bit further north..."},{"lineNumber":40846,"originalJapaneseLine":"　イタリアとテープを挟むニカニカ平原に、","translatedEnglishLine":"In the Nikanika Plain, between Italia and Tape,"},{"lineNumber":40847,"originalJapaneseLine":"　炎軍、氷軍両軍の防衛線が展開しているはずです」","translatedEnglishLine":"the defensive lines of both the Flame Army and the Ice Army should be deployed.\""},{"lineNumber":40848,"originalJapaneseLine":"「このまま北東を目指せばいいんですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So I should aim northeast as is, right?\""},{"lineNumber":40849,"originalJapaneseLine":"「氷軍か……お、そういえば","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The Ice Army, huh... Oh, now that you mention it,"},{"lineNumber":40850,"originalJapaneseLine":"　氷軍はウスピラちゃんがボスだったな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Uspira-chan was the boss of the Ice Army.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きゃっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kyah!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっと。……ちっ、暴徒になってやがる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oops... Tch, they've turned into rioters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何人かが民衆に声を掛けて回るが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several people went around calling out to the crowd,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 邪魔する者を突き飛ばしてでも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but those trying to interfere were shoved aside,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食料を得ようとする者が後を絶たない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and there was no end to those trying to grab food.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん。仕方のない連中だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph. They’re miserable people with no choice."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルは懐から粉末の入った袋を出して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle took out a bag of powder from his pocket,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街の中央の噴水に放り込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and tossed it into the central fountain of the town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ブラックアーム！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Black Arm!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぐ、ぐぐぐぐ……うわあっ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, ggggg... Uwaaah!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がぼがぼがぼ…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gulp gulp gulp......"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃああっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaaa!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、魔法で生み出した黒い手で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, with a black hand created by magic,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 噴水へとどんどん人々を放り込んでいく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he kept throwing people into the fountain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ははははは！　特製の消化薬を溶かした噴水だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahahaha! This is a fountain with a special digestive medicine dissolved in it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今すぐ楽にしてくれよう！　はーーーっははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll make things easier for you right now! Hahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうこうしている内にようやく騒ぎは収まり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While this was going on, the commotion finally settled down,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しずつ食料は分配されていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the food began to be distributed little by little.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……びっくりしちゃった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haah... That was a surprise."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい……私も、飢饉の害にあった現場は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... It's also my first time witnessing the effects of a famine firsthand..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初めてで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's my first time..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーむ。思った以上に酷いな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm. It's worse than I thought."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、ここはまだマシです……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, this place is still better off...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動く気力が、辛うじて残ってましたから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: because the will to move remains just barely."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やややつれているが、幾分マシな様子の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somewhat worn out but seemingly better off,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス軍人が、ランスの元にやってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a Zeth soldier came over to Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前、ここの責任者か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you the person responsible here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ、ランス総統閣下。連絡は頂いております。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, Supreme Leader Rance. We have received your message.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 氷軍第3防衛中隊長、ラブルムと申します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am Labrum, Captain of the 3rd Defense Platoon of the Ice Army."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……正直申し上げて、助かりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...To be honest, you saved us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう1日、2日遅ければ、餓死者で溢れていました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you had been one or two days later, we would have been overwhelmed by deaths from starvation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん。お前らがむざむざ降伏するから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph. This is what happens because you guys surrender so easily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなことになるんだろうが。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This kind of thing would happen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男は戦って死ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Men should die fighting."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「耳が痛い……しかし、他に手段はないのです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That stings to hear... but we have no other options.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僅かにでも勝ち目があれば、死力を尽くします。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there's even a slight chance to win, we will give everything we've got.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ですが、魔人相手では……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But against demons..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「けっ、根性無しが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, you’re a coward."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス……無理言っちゃだめだよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rance... don’t be too harsh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍が通り過ぎたと言っても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even if the demon army has passed through,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物の襲撃がまったくないわけではありません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it doesn't mean there won't be any monster attacks at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げ遅れた市民を守るためには、これしか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To protect the citizens who couldn't escape, this is the only way..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「結局俺が何とかしてやるしかないのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In the end, does that mean I have to do something about this myself?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアはどこだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where’s Galtia?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最前線はもう少し北……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The front line is a bit further north...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イタリアとテープを挟むニカニカ平原に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the Nikanika Plain, between Italia and Tape,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 炎軍、氷軍両軍の防衛線が展開しているはずです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the defensive lines of both the Flame Army and the Ice Army should be deployed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このまま北東を目指せばいいんですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So I should aim northeast as is, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「氷軍か……お、そういえば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Ice Army, huh... Oh, now that you mention it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 氷軍はウスピラちゃんがボスだったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uspira-chan was the boss of the Ice Army."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい……私も、飢饉の害にあった現場は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... It's also my first time witnessing the effects of a famine firsthand..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初めてで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's my first time..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーむ。思った以上に酷いな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm. It's worse than I thought."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、ここはまだマシです……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, this place is still better off...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動く気力が、辛うじて残ってましたから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: because the will to move remains just barely."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やややつれているが、幾分マシな様子の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somewhat worn out but seemingly better off,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス軍人が、ランスの元にやってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a Zeth soldier came over to Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前、ここの責任者か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you the person responsible here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ、ランス総統閣下。連絡は頂いております。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, Supreme Leader Rance. We have received your message.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 氷軍第3防衛中隊長、ラブルムと申します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am Labrum, Captain of the 3rd Defense Platoon of the Ice Army."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……正直申し上げて、助かりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...To be honest, you saved us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう1日、2日遅ければ、餓死者で溢れていました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you had been one or two days later, we would have been overwhelmed by deaths from starvation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん。お前らがむざむざ降伏するから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph. This is what happens because you guys surrender so easily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなことになるんだろうが。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This kind of thing would happen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男は戦って死ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Men should die fighting."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「耳が痛い……しかし、他に手段はないのです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That stings to hear... but we have no other options.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僅かにでも勝ち目があれば、死力を尽くします。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there's even a slight chance to win, we will give everything we've got.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ですが、魔人相手では……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But against demons..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「けっ、根性無しが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, you’re a coward."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス……無理言っちゃだめだよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rance... don’t be too harsh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍が通り過ぎたと言っても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even if the demon army has passed through,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物の襲撃がまったくないわけではありません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it doesn't mean there won't be any monster attacks at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げ遅れた市民を守るためには、これしか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To protect the citizens who couldn't escape, this is the only way..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「結局俺が何とかしてやるしかないのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In the end, does that mean I have to do something about this myself?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアはどこだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where’s Galtia?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最前線はもう少し北……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The front line is a bit further north...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イタリアとテープを挟むニカニカ平原に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the Nikanika Plain, between Italia and Tape,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 炎軍、氷軍両軍の防衛線が展開しているはずです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the defensive lines of both the Flame Army and the Ice Army should be deployed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このまま北東を目指せばいいんですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So I should aim northeast as is, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「氷軍か……お、そういえば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Ice Army, huh... Oh, now that you mention it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 氷軍はウスピラちゃんがボスだったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uspira-chan was the boss of the Ice Army."
